attributes.action: restrict fundamentalism in the UK for the greater good
attributes.background:
fundamentalism, has no place in british society, people are welcome to emigrate here on certain conditions... they wish to become british, ie part of british society, they do not bring their own laws, 
as the UK is a free democracy, that works based on common values and UK law.

rejection.details: If you could start a petition with a clearer request for action from the Government or Parliament, we could look at this again.
